description: This file defines lightweight UI primitive functions for styling rectangle surfaces and text, with support for rounded corners and focus/hover interactions. It serves as a helper module to ensure visual consistency across the project.

methods.name: pill(bg = Theme.colors.primary, radius = Theme.radii.md)
methods.description: Returns style configuration for a rounded rectangle background with customizable color and corner radius.

methods.name: textStyle(size = Theme.typography.bodySize, color = Theme.colors.text, alpha = 1)
methods.description: Returns style configuration for text, including font size, color, alpha, and layout parameters.

ctags.name: textStyle
ctags.pattern: /^export function textStyle(size = Theme.typography.bodySize, color = Theme.colors.text, alpha = 1/
